long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superstash is a next-gen tab manager that lets you save anywhere and organize your items. It is a browser extension that is versatile, easy to use, and minimalistic. Just pin the tab, and you're good to go. Created by Flowtide.

Features

Versatile: Use for anything you want like read later, tab management, and more.
Easy to Use: Drag and drop, right-click, or drag in any of your open tabs to save them to Superstash.
Minimalistic: Minimalistic design, clean and simple UI.

Try it out today and start organizing your digital life!
